name: Rise of Myths: Cthulhu
description:
Rise of Myths: Cthulhu ia roguelite deck-building game in which you will improve your deck after each attempt, as you face the Great Old Ones and their minions, while they try to destroy your body and sanity. Take on the role of one of the daring adventurers and face the threat that looms over you alone or as a team, inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft and his collaborators. Prepare yourself for an epic battle. Every move can make the difference between salvation or absolute doom. 

In RoM: Cthulhu, players will join forces to combat monsters in this deckbuilding game set in Lovecraft's world.  Each game will be different as you encounter randomly generated encounters and locations. Each player character and Great Old One location comes with unique attributes and mechanics, offering a variety of end-game possibilities. Rules also allow for different difficulty levels to suit each player.
